alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 3:58AM AKST until January 24 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Visibility reduced to one half mile or less at times in blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Denali and Alaska Range passes. * WHEN...From noon Monday to 9 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
